com.kuka.roboticsAPI.controllerModel

Interface IStateTracker


  • public interface IStateTracker
    Interface for components interested in the status of a group of controllers.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addControllerStateListener(IControllerStateListener listener)
      Adds a listener.
      String getErrorDetails(String controllerName)
      Gets the boot state of the controller.

      Removes a listener.

    • Method Detail

      • addControllerStateListener

        void addControllerStateListener(IControllerStateListener listener)
        Adds a listener. The listener is informed when controller state is changed.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener that will be registered. null is not allowed.

        The same listener instance can be registered only once. Multiple registration attempts for the same listener instance will be ignored.

        This element is an undocumented internal feature. It is not intended to be used by applications as it might change or be removed in future versions.

      • removeControllerStateListener

        void removeControllerStateListener(IControllerStateListener listener)
        Removes a listener. The listener is removed from the list of listener that are informed when safety state is changed.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener that will be unregistered. null is not allowed.
        This element is an undocumented internal feature. It is not intended to be used by applications as it might change or be removed in future versions.

      • getState

        com.kuka.roboticsAPI.controllerModel.ControllerState getState(String controllerName)
        Gets the boot state of the controller.
        Parameters:
        controllerName - the controller
        Returns:
        the boot state of the controller
        This element is an undocumented internal feature. It is not intended to be used by applications as it might change or be removed in future versions.

      • getStateInfo

        ControllerStateInfo getStateInfo(String controllerName)
        Gets the boot info object of the controller.
        Parameters:
        controllerName - the controller
        Returns:
        boot info object
        This element is an undocumented internal feature. It is not intended to be used by applications as it might change or be removed in future versions.

        String getErrorDetails(String controllerName)
        Gets the boot state of the controller.
        Parameters:

        the boot state of the controller.
        This element is an undocumented internal feature. It is not intended to be used by applications as it might change or be removed in future versions.
